knimeNode.name: SimpleDatabaseWriter
knimeNode.shortDescription: Writes table data to a corresponding database table.

fullDescription.intro: Establishes and opens a preconfigured connection to a database. The connection settings are taken from the information provided by the user in KNIME's preferences dialogue. Make sure you have filled in all necessary information. The node scans the data at the inport and checks whether the database contains a corresponding table or not. If a corresponding table exists, all data from the inport table will be written to the corresponding database table.

ports.inPort: Table with data to write into database
